title: Friend Function & Class
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
Function that is not member but can access Private members. 
"A friend can inspect your private parts". Use sparingly.

interview_questions.question: Is friendship inherited?
interview_questions.answer: No. Father's friend is not Son's friend.

real_world_use_cases.description: `operator<<(ostream&, MyClass&)` must be friend to access private data.
